author: gmazza
msg: Comment added on how ApplicationContext is made available to CXFServlet.

author: slessard
msg: MYFACES-1974 - Implementing Java 5 features on all projects, last pass until Java 5 features get added to shared, this patch also includes some reformat to enforce similar rules throughout the classes;
*** IMPORTANT *** This patch might break backward compatibility for some people if extending impl directly.
However, most of the time, it shouldn't be an issue as you're not supposed to extend impl in order to remain implementation agnostic.
The main compatibility breaking change involve method signature alteration to make them return a Collection rather than an Iterator to leverage enhanced for looping.
